repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:16.04
MAINTAINER Hee Won Lee "knowpd@research.att.com"

RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y vim iputils-ping net-tools dnsutils curl python fio && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN curl -f -LO https://storage.googleapis.com/kubernetes-release/release/$( curl -f -s https://storage.googleapis.com/kubernetes-release/release/stable.txt)/bin/linux/amd64/kubectl
RUN mv /kubectl /usr/local/bin/kubectl && chmod +x /usr/local/bin/kubectl
